title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Ranked Queues Disabled @ 0130 - 07/05/2015
body:
Summoners,

**TL;DR - Ranked & Team Builder queues will be disabled early on 7 May at 01:30am AEST.**

One of our internet links for our Oceanic League of Legends servers will be undergoing maintenance tonight, and our provider has advised that there may be some impact to this connection during that time.  

We have multiple links in place for our servers, so we're putting some workarounds in to ensure minimal impact to games in progress when the affected link goes down.

As a precaution, we'll be disabling Ranked & Team Builder 90 minutes prior, to ensure that any unexpected issues don't cause any lost LP.

See you on the Rift!
-Mindstar

replies.body: When is ranked que expected to be back in place?

I just lost my ranked game because of the server problem, I'm not sure what kind of problem it is, but I'm pretty sure it is the server problem. 8 out of 10 players kept DCing in one game, we thought the game will be 'lost prevented', but it doesn't, we still lost LP.
